name: LioDen Dragon Layout
description:
One of the layouts from my Free CSS Layouts thread on LioDen(http://www.lioden.com/topic.php?id=25549), now for the whole site ;)


Original art by http://theoutcast1821.deviantart.com/  Wallpaper was made by them and available for download.
(Their signature can't be seen well at some screen sizes. I take absolutely no credit for it. The only thing here that is mine is the coding.)
additional_info: I highly recommend disabling user CSS/HTML in Den Descriptions. There's an option to turn them off, and I suggest doing so if you're to use this or any style for LioDen's whole site. Other CSS in dens will conflict with this otherwise. Change Log -Update from 4/20/2016- Fixed a few things, like the sub menu in chatter. May still need a few more slight changes. Also fixed the issue conflicting with hunting and patrolling maps.
